player.name: Player
player.description: The hero of our story... don't prove us wrong.
player.WARNING: DOUBLES AS A SAVE FILE. DO NOT MODIFY.

enemies.name: Minion
enemies.description: Weak minions sent from some unknown land.

enemies.name: Space Guardian
enemies.description:
A powerful ship pretending to be a protector of the sky. 
\
                             A more appropriate name would be Space Destroyer.

enemies.name: Bakesale Monster
enemies.description: The final powerful boss. The true identity of the mastermind behind all these evil ships.

weapons.name: Water Gun
weapons.description: In what galaxy is it logical to use water guns to attack spaceships?

weapons.name: Bomb Formula 9001
weapons.description: A small and powerful bullet that explodes on impact. Simply the best weapon in any galaxy.

misc.name: Asteroid
misc.description: Random floating rocks. Avoid at all costs! Your ship is flying too fast and will crash!

immovable.name: Floating Mine
immovable.description: A deadly floating mine created by an evil mastermind. Stay far away from these!
